poll.title: Title
poll.polls:
[{"creator":"0xb2aa52f94db4516c5beecef363af850a","description":"With the growing demand for Move deployment in the Starcoin ecosystem, Starcoin plans to initiate a new proposal to officially open the Move contract. The proposal will start voting on June 23, 2021, and will end on June 30, 2021. It is proposed to fully open the deployment of Move contracts, allowing anyone to deploy Move contracts on the chain and build DeFi applications. The passage of this proposal will be a milestone moment, which means that the Starcoin ecosystem is completely open to embrace the DeFi ecosystem in an all-round way. This proposal is a voting proposal for the change of OnChainConfig. The configuration on the chain is changed through voting. 

# Proposal information
1. Original OnChainConfig


0x1::TransactionPublishOption::TransactionPublishOption{
 module_publishing_allowed: false,
 script_allowed: false,
} 


2. The changed OnChainConfig


0x1::TransactionPublishOption::TransactionPublishOption{
 module_publishing_allowed: true,
 script_allowed: true,
)


3. Proposal id: 1

4. Proposal transaction: https://explorer.starcoin.org/main/transactions/detail/0x299b901b998b54d46e71edda46663fc62d8168f5dea24c2dbd05a7813f42d889

5. Proposal initiating account: 0xb2aa52f94db4516c5beecef363af850a","id":1,"link":"https://github.com/starcoinorg/starcoin/discussions/2621","status":2,"title":"Starcoin Move publish open","for_votes":"0","against_votes":"0","end_time":"1625055256096","type_args_1":"0x1::OnChainConfigDao::OnChainConfigUpdate<0x1::TransactionPublishOption::TransactionPublishOption>"},{"creator":"0xb2aa52f94db4516c5beecef363af850a","description":"Voting for the Starcoin Move stdlib v5 upgrade is open. This upgrade is the first stdlib upgrade since the Starcoin mainnet lanuched and includes the following features.

- Add limit on treasury withdrawals proposol amount, the maximum amount of which cannot exceed the voted threshold (4% of the current liquidity). (#2566)
- Implemented a new on-chain authentication strategy to simplify the complexity of initializing on-chain accounts. (#2562)

## Upgrade proposal information
- Upgrade package binary: https://github.com/starcoinorg/starcoin/tree/master/vm/stdlib/compiled/5/4-5
- Package hash: 0x20d79acaca9c50d4cbf51a992e5de658dcecf39c1573244f7d850b4b47af56d360
- Proposal id: 0
- Proposal transaction: https://explorer.starcoin.org/main/transactions/detail/0x0237dba2eb4ea5971f7fb53693acb91f6879bfa12db3c15f1a6281e1661d9ee0
- Proposer address: 0xb2aa52f94db4516c5beecef363af850a

Coin holders are invited to vote on the chain. When voting, the STC of the current account will be stake to the contract until the end of the voting period, which is currently 7 days. ** To encourage participation in on-chain governance, incentives for on-chain governance will be introduced in the future. Users who participate in voting this time will be compensated according to the incentive strategy. **","id":0,"link":"https://github.com/starcoinorg/starcoin/discussions/2578","status":7,"title":"Starcoin Move stdlib upgrade","for_votes":"7088587710402048","against_votes":"2000000000","end_time":"1623744459856","type_args_1":"0x1::UpgradeModuleDaoProposal::UpgradeModuleV2"}]

poll.warning: Vote cannot be changed after submission. Staked STC used to vote in polls are locked and cannot be withdrawn until the poll finishes.
poll.minDateMsg: The end time must be at least 7 days later than the start time.
